properties.name: trampoline.security.jwt.secret
properties.description: Minimum length 16 string used to sign jwt.

properties.name: trampoline.security.jwt.token-timeout
properties.description: Seconds before a jwt is considered expired.

properties.name: trampoline.security.jwt.header
properties.description: Name of the header containing our token.

properties.name: trampoline.security.jwt.header-schema
properties.description: Header schema used inside the authentication header.

properties.name: trampoline.security.jwt.claims.principal-id
properties.description: Claim key to use for principal id.

properties.name: trampoline.security.jwt.claims.username
properties.description: Claim key to use for username.

properties.name: trampoline.security.jwt.claims.authorities
properties.description: Claim key to use for authorities.
